title: can you help me sort this out
body: i now have a 20 min wait time to enter any game, i got to one game left with the 10 minute one, then your servers went down so i had to wait again! and then i was going in to the last game and my internet went off! so now i have to wait 20 minutes for 5 games come!

replies.body:
20-minute low priority queues are only added to an account after it has exhibited a trend of disconnections from matches. If you're disconnecting from matches frequently, it's likely there's a core reason causing them and it's something we can troubleshoot and resolve together. 

I'll need more context as to what happens when you "internet went off". Did you lose all connection to your network or did you see any particular error messages or behavior from the client? With that info, I'll be able to suggest steps to take. Thanks
